Package com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.entity.User
com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service.Manager
public class Manager extends User
The Manager class extends the User class and provides additional functionalities specific to the "Manager" role in the Online Food Delivery System. Managers can remove delivery persons, restock items, add new items to inventory, and view their profile. This class is annotated with @RoleCheck to ensure that only users with the "Manager" role can access its methods.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Biswajit Adhikary

      public Manager(String id, String name)

      name - the manager's name

  • Method Details

    • removeDeliveryPerson

      public void removeDeliveryPerson(List<DeliveryPerson> list, String name)
      Removes a DeliveryPerson from the provided list based on the provided name. Only a user with the "Manager" role is allowed to perform this operation.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of DeliveryPerson objects
      name - the name of the delivery person to remove

    • restockItem

      public void restockItem(Map<FoodItem,Integer> inventory, String itemName, int quantity)
      Restocks an existing food item in the inventory by increasing its quantity. If the item does not exist, notifies that the item will be added as new.
      Parameters:
      inventory - the inventory map with FoodItem as key and quantity as value
      itemName - the name of the item to restock
      quantity - the quantity to add

    • addNewItem

      public void addNewItem(Map<FoodItem,Integer> inventory, String name, double price, int quantity)
      Adds a new food item to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      inventory - the inventory map with FoodItem as key and quantity as value
      name - the name of the new food item
      price - the price of the new food item
      quantity - the initial quantity of the new food item

    • showProfile

      public void showProfile()
      Displays the manager's profile information.
